name: Grannys Homemade Jaffas!!
description:
NB: you have to press "full screen" before the game launch or else the UI is out of frame.

You move with "WASD"

you interact/pickUp  objects using RMB ("right mouse Button")

you stack the  ingredience that are ordered on a plate,

when the plate is full, put them in the oven for 4 seconds.

and then serve the freshly baked jaffas to the hungry santa!

it is as easy as that!  (look at screenshots for more information)

Music : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gm3puQtwXcg
